document_data.mainbody:
Summon efreeti was a spell used by wizards.
When cast, this spell summoned an efreeti, a powerful genie from the Elemental Plane of Fire. The caster had control over the efreeti, and it would defend the caster or attack his or her enemies. If the caster mistreated the efreeti, it could break the control over it and turn against the caster.
